attributes.action: Cllr Stephenson (joked about Manchester PC deaths) should resign from Erewash Council
attributes.additional_details:
The sick joke was "If you get 100 points for shooting one policewoman and 200 points for shooting two policewomen, how many do you get for shooting a lawyer?"
He then called the police officer who rang him to complain "you silly man".
He brings both the role of Councillor and the Conservative Party into disrepute.  Cllr Stephenson should resign.
